name: Candle Prick
description:
Candle Prick is a crunchy pixel adventure about stabbing enemies and using them as extensions of yourself to solve increasingly complex puzzles. Simple mechanics will give way to complicated scenarios as you discover different ways to interact with the environment.



  • 60+ Levels of escalating difficulty
  • 15+ Pretty palettes to choose from
  • A simple to learn but hard to master puzzle system
